DOC.brief_title: Liposomal Bupivacaine vs. Bupivacaine Hydrochloride Lidocaine During Suburethral Sling Placement
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , comparative , randomize study . Women pure stress urinary incontinence mixed urinary incontinence predominant stress component choose proceed midurethral sling randomize two group . The study group hydro-dissection perform dilute liposomal bupivacaine solution . The comparison group would hydro-dissection perform diluted bupivacaine HCL Lidocaine solution . The postoperative pain compare group use visual analog scale . The quality recovery compare group use quality recovery short form . Postoperative opioid consumption compare two group .
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status IIII Age > 18 year Not Pregnant Able give inform consent Electively choose surgical management SUI suburethral sling Pregnant nursing Allergy amide anesthetic History drug alcohol abuse Severe cardiovascular , hepatic , renal disease neurological impairment , Longacting opioid within 3 day opioid use within 24 hour surgery Patients take monoamineoxidase inhibitor ( MAOI ) antidepressants triptyline imipramine type Contraindication : Acetaminophen , Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) , Hydrocodone , Oxycodone , Hydromorphone AND Morphine , Administration investigational drug within 30 day study Chronic pain syndrome Daily NSAID opioid use Patients undergo concomitant procedure
